entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning late this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
